title: 7.15 Omega Squad skins not available for purchase
body: I have updated the client and everything and I cannot buy the new omega squad skins, or the teemo chromas. There is no option to purchase them

replies.body: New skins planned to release during a patch doesn't mean it will be on the same day.  Bookmark the [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for news and hang tight!
I do have a question - how come these chromas were not included on the patch notes? I saw the Omega Squad skins but not the teemo chroma packs.  These are obviously must buys for me
